PlaceholderDesc_IsInitialState: true if the state is the initiale state of the state machine.
PlaceholderDesc_HasEndConnection: true if the state has a connection to an end node of the state machine.
PlaceholderDesc_Transitions: Transitions of the state. For details check cur_state_transition.
PlaceholderDesc_ScriptType: Type of the script. Can be None, Code or NodeGraph sein..
PlaceholderDesc_InitialFunction: Initial function of the state. Can be null if no script is added.
PlaceholderDesc_AdditionalFunctions: Additional functions of the state. Can be iterated using for.
PlaceholderDesc_AllFunctions: All functions of the state. Can be iterated using for.
